channel.title: Comments on: Interview with Naftali Loewenthal at Lubavitch News Serivce
channel.description: notes on Jewish theology and spirituality

item.title: By: Shalom
item.dc:creator: Shalom
item.description: I once contacted him about practical aspects of Hitbonanuet. He sent me a beautiful letter with lots of advice which I go to all the time. He also sent me incredible advice about hitbonanuet and davening .
item.content:encoded: I once contacted him about practical aspects of Hitbonanuet. He sent me a beautiful letter with lots of advice which I go to all the time. He also sent me incredible advice about hitbonanuet and davening .

item.title: By: Ploni
item.dc:creator: Ploni
item.description: He's a חסיד מן השורה. He makes a parnasa in the academic field, so he uses the ideas current in that arena. But he's a regular chassid. He actually believes and lives according to the teachings of Chabad.
item.content:encoded: He’s a חסיד מן השורה. He makes a parnasa in the academic field, so he uses the ideas current in that arena. But he’s a regular chassid. He actually believes and lives according to the teachings of Chabad.

item.title: By: Alan Brill
item.dc:creator: Alan Brill
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://kavvanah.wordpress.com/2011/04/16/interview-with-naftali-loewenthal-at-lubavitch-news-serivce/#comment-2992">Daat Yachid</a>.
why do you think that? Most average chassidim dont open their books on Chabad with a discussion of Heikhalot and Moshe Idel.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Daat Yachid.

why do you think that? Most average chassidim dont open their books on Chabad with a discussion of Heikhalot and Moshe Idel.

item.title: By: Daat Yachid
item.dc:creator: Daat Yachid
item.description: OK ;-) What do you think of the fact that even though he's an academic, he accepts the material at face value, exactly the same as the regular non-academic chassid?
item.content:encoded:
OK 😉
What do you think of the fact that even though he’s an academic, he accepts the material at face value, exactly the same as the regular non-academic chassid?

He seemed like an interesting fellow.
item.content:encoded:

He seemed like an interesting fellow.

item.title: By: Daat Yachid
item.dc:creator: Daat Yachid
item.description:
"Naftali Loewenthal caught my interest about twenty years ago"
What interested you about Loewenthal?
